title: N.Korea reports first COVID-19 outbreak, orders lockdown in "gravest emergency"
content:
1. N.Korea reports first COVID-19 outbreak, orders lockdown in "gravest emergency"  Reuters.com
  2. Covid-19 Live News: North Korea Reports First Case  The New York Times
  3. North Korea declares 'major national emergency' as first case of Covid-19 identified, state media reports  CNN
  4. North Korea reports positive covid case for the first time  The Washington Post
  5. North Korea admits to Covid outbreak for first time and declares ‘severe national emergency’  The Guardian
contentSnippet:
N.Korea reports first COVID-19 outbreak, orders lockdown in "gravest emergency"  Reuters.com
Covid-19 Live News: North Korea Reports First Case  The New York Times
North Korea declares 'major national emergency' as first case of Covid-19 identified, state media reports  CNN
North Korea reports positive covid case for the first time  The Washington Post
North Korea admits to Covid outbreak for first time and declares ‘severe national emergency’  The Guardian

localize.title: 韓国でCOVID-19の感染が報告され、"最も深刻な緊急事態 "として閉鎖が指示された。
韩国报告首次爆发COVID-19疫情，下令封锁 "最严重的紧急情况"
韓國報告首次爆發COVID-19疫情，下令封鎖 "最嚴重的緊急情況"
